data.title: Christian Church in Lake Stevens. WA
data.meta_description: Whether you’ve attended church your whole life or have never stepped into a church, LifePoint is a great place to be. We invite you to come look around and sit in a service. You’ll find a community of people who are passionate about their faith sharing Jesus’ love and having fun while doing it.
data.text:
Lake Stevens

Join Us Sunday's

8:30, 9:45, 11:00 AM

14619 28th St NE

Lake Stevens, WA

Marysville

Join Us Sunday's

9:15 & 10:30 AM

1607 Fourth St

Marysville, WA

Online

Join Us Sunday's

8:30, 9:45, 11:00 AM

Streaming from our Lake Stevens Campus on Church Online, YouTube, and Facebook

Ways We Do

Community

Sunday Services

The way our church community joins together every Sunday. Service times and locations may change but our Sunday's are always centered on worshipping God and connecting with others.

Groups are fun, supportive groups of any size where you can build healthy relationships, deepen your connection with God, and serve alongside others.

Join a team today to begin making a difference and find your purpose while serving others. We can all play a part in what God is doing no matter our age or background.

Ways We Do

Community

Sunday Services

The large, corporate gathering of our church community every Sunday. Service times and locations may change but our gathering is always centered on worshipping God and connecting with others.

Groups are small gatherings of 10-15 people who meet in person to hang, discuss a recent Sunday message, and pray together.

Join a team today to begin making a difference and find your purpose while serving others. We can all play a part in what God is doing no matter our age or background.

Take me to:

LP Kidz is the next generation of leaders. Every Sunday from Birth to 5th Grade, are equipped with knowledge of the love of God and their identity. LP Kidz services happen simultaneously with LifePoint Church services.

LifePoint YTH is the junior high and high school community of LifePoint Church. We are committed to creating a place where young people can belong, grow, and encounter God. LifePoint YTH services happen on Sunday mornings & evenings.

Take me to:

LP Kidz is the next generation of leaders. Every Sunday from Birth to 5th Grade, are equipped with knowledge of the love of God and their identity. LP Kidz services happen simultaneously with LifePoint Church services.

LifePoint YTH is the junior high and high school community of LifePoint Church. We are committed to creating a place where young people can belong, grow, and encounter God. LifePoint YTH services happen on Sunday mornings & evenings.
